page.title: 10Mail & Bus service Tongue
page.content: There are two bus services in the area One leaves Tongue in the morning and travels east to Thurso, calling at all the small communities off the main road on the way and emptying 14 letter boxes on the way. The driver takes parcels and goods to Thurso as well and brings back all sorts of things... from laundry to wreaths. As well as all these things he carries passengers and school children. The other mail bus goes south to Lairg to meet the train. It carries goods and paaengers and brings back mail and daily papers. This means that the morning paper and letters are delivered around tea-time. Both buses have to contend with very bad conditions in wintertime. One bus driver was marooned inThurso for a week because of snow, and two years ago one had to be lifted to safety by helicopter
